page.title: 15Burscough-Jobs Today-Lorries
page.content: by Geoff My dad is a lorry driver.He gets up at 5a.m.and gets changed.He has a cup of coffee and ten minutes later is driven to work by mum.He starts up his A reg. D.A.F.truck and looks at his notes.He is going to Slough to collect Mars Bars.He gets on to the M6 at about 6a.m.and does a steady 55m.p.h.and curses all the people who think they own the middle lane.He listens to Radio One,it helps to keep him alert.He arrives at 10a.m.and backs into a bay.He goes to have his breakfast arrives back an hour later.He sets off for home at 2p.m.and arrives at Liverpool to unload at 6p.m.He drives back to Burscough and leaves the lorry in the yard after filling up with diesel.He then goes home for tea at 6.30.
